documents.document: @josephbrock @salthorsebar (They do, I saw them yesterday).

Strong, fearless, truthful journalism does not exist on shit clickbait. It requires you to pay, and you absolutely should.
Today I signed up to the @nytimes, in Nov, The @guardian. We live in a world where strong, fearless, truthful journalism must be supported.
How about that. https://t.co/TvoDv8oixT
@richardcheese Any chance of a visit to the UK, Cheese?
@sixdnorthedn Look at his happy wee face.
Watching the protest at #JFKTerminal4. Hell yes.
Watching the second Hobbit film. @stephenfry's turn as Trump is sensational.
@tempestbrewco I’m sure I can work that one out.
@_kelseyw @mrjamesporteous @stuu666 @stvbles Yeah, it books up quite far in advance.
@_kelseyw Lots of love for Locanda. Also - their wine list is utterly insane (in a good way).
@whatjoewrote Christ, I remember that half ten 7s game at World of Fitba ages ago. Nearly fell asleep in the car.
@amosie Guess it depends where you’re travelling. Running user research in Hong Kong was the coolest trip I’ve ever been on!
@_AndyYoung You remember that every time you look at that muntjac with the broken tooth.
@_AndyYoung That was the very definition of an open goal.
@_AndyYoung Nah. They wouldn't. ;)
@madmanc1970 @twelvetriangles That was 350 years ago, they’ve done some good bread in the interim. I think you need to move on…
Had the whole haggis, neeps and mash thing last night, thus leaving enough for a skanky haggis melt today. Cheers Rab.
@_hammy That’s actually just where the terminus for the 238 is.
@draclarke @_andyyoung Still waiting on this btw.
@georgiefw @twelvetriangles Hah hah, I didn't see this until after I'd written virtually the same thing. Corroboration, I guess!
Took me an age to finally pick one up, but @twelvetriangles white sourdough is as good as any loaf I've had in London. Top class.
@moorbeersales @TheGroveHudds The JJJ made my recollection a little hazy...
@moorbeersales @TheGroveHudds Cheers Justin, enjoyed the tasting at Salt Horse last year! Can't remember if I mentioned it was my gin...
@whatjoewrote @_hammy (not) bringing home the bacon.
@KieranSpeirs I thought those were both the same date. That would be a particularly controlling brewer.
@tom_weaver (I was more pissed about the money than the principle).
@tom_weaver I kept getting served a cached search that showed me a ticket price it was impossible to book. Drove me nuts.
@tom_weaver I was pissed as hell when the same thing happened to me. The problem is way bigger than one airline.
@tom_weaver This is a pretty good grounding in it. https://t.co/zyPD48qNQ7
@tom_weaver the issue is that you’re seeing a very modern, crisp front-end to a very clunky old pile of global distribution services.
@msswiggy I was very confused in London at the weekend. There is a lot of dark down there.
@cleverclauds @msswiggy I had to shave our sofa after the cat had a go at it.
@wstauk @PHammondMP @hmtreasury It should be cut by a greater amount for small producers. Worked wonders for craft beer.
@Crignet I thought Zovirax was the cold sore stuff.
@Crignet I *think* one of them is called Zovirax.
In the quiet carriage with some fuckwomble who thinks we all want to hear a phone call about her wankily-named kids.

@coffeelowdown @lunchquest Hmm… will have to go for a look.
@lunchquest @coffeelowdown What’s happened? I was there just after Christmas and it was the same as ever…
Made it 19 glorious days into 2017 without hearing the Sleaford Mods on 6 Music. Knew it wouldn’t last.
@_andyyoung Well? Did you smash it? Don’t keep us hanging like this!
@68andBoston Hey guys, reckon we'd need a booking for a few folk drinking wine at half 6 this Saturday?
@henrydimbleby no idea how relevant it is outside of academia though.
@henrydimbleby Totally. We were warned about it when I was doing my MSc. https://t.co/7JThBL4ANQ
@_hammy @whatjoewrote Giving you very little time to get all that work done.
@whatjoewrote @gruntinggrowler Ah man, I loved the polystyrene…
@sixdnorthedn That one of the mahoosive 6” cask clips? Biggest I ever saw in my delivery days.
@_andyyoung @hyperisland (and also shows you’re no stranger to the public sector ;) )
@_andyyoung @hyperisland Right there. That’s why they pay you the big bucks.
@_andyyoung @hyperisland Got to love a post-it that’s trimmed right down to the sticky bit.
@pilotbeeruk It's spelled "woof", not "wtf".
@pilotbeeruk You mean the dog does it all? Am I talking to a dog? This is incredible.
@pilotbeeruk You guys just say this stuff in the brewery to generate quotable Twitter content while you work, right?
@_AndyYoung Fly me in doll.
Joe Fuckin' Biden. What a guy. https://t.co/D7kzv10Yy7
Currently filling the time during distilling by teaching myself HTML/CSS. Cheers to @josephbrock for the resource pointers.
@jayrayner1 As a distiller, current fav is “hand-distilled”, which unless you’re the Human Torch, would be pretty tricky to achieve.
@joesmithdesign Ha, cheers man. Enjoying the whole building a company / making booze thang. Will let you know when I break the US...
@joesmithdesign allllll the stupid. Just came across as a wandered idiot, really.
What the fuck is this walking toupee on about.
@magicrockbrewco @nsziggysan Was Donald Trump visiting today?
@clairestrickett you work for a big company, I’m sure there’s some sort of personal development fund you could use to desk-mount one?
@clairestrickett Boiling water tap? Two jobs I’ve worked in had them. Tea consumption reached terrifying levels each time.
@louisedowne I’m not seeing what Amy was at this end…
Forgotten how fun squash is. The added, grown-up bonus of having so many, many ways to injure yourself really spices it up.
Playing squash later. I’m dubious that my childhood prowess will come to the fore. To be blunt, I suspect I may keel over.
Always surprised more people don’t just say “fuck it” and have a wee skive on a tube strike day. It’s just work.
I fucking hate Theresa May. Every time she speaks I want to emigrate.
@_hammy police have described the man as largely harmless, but warned the public not to engage him in conversation.
@KieranSpeirs @BuxtonBrewery Had it on keg at @BrauhausEd the other night. Helluva beer.
Went to a ceilidh last night. Wore a kilt. Shouted heuch a lot. Basically a great big happy stereotype.
@lunchquest Looks like a pretty generic World Drier clone to me. Love a manual action though.
@tombonnick @ElecSpiritCo cheers man, a surprise and no mistake!
As much as I love my kilt, the best part of wearing one is being released from its embrace at the end of the night.
@pilotbeeruk Movember though? Not exactly a fresh pint there.
@madmanc1970 @whatjoewrote I would have said ham, but fair play.
@whatjoewrote Hah hah, I thought you were mocking it, didn’t realise you wrote the thing!
@whatjoewrote Is the second part independent of the first?
@clairestrickett That’s newspaper long-form / university term paper territory. Unless the quality is impeccable it’s TLDR fodder.
@chrispople Introducing the new, awful trend of 2017…
@NewWaveFella I have Georgia, she crashes around a fair bit.
The Mummy, Jumanji, and now The Great Escape. Productivity = zero.
Current price for an uber from Bruntsfield to Queen Street is 26+ bucks. Fuck a duck.
@madmanc1970 Cheers bud, here's to the next one.
I'm on a roof, delighted that I moved to Edinburgh. Come at me 2017. https://t.co/8Sc804xRu5
Hogmanay dinner at @timberyard10 tonight. First time I'll have been there in a while (apart from delivering drinks, but that doesn't count).
@whosyerpal Probably just think you look like a shoplifter to be honest. ;)
Great to see Don McCullin is to be knighted. My dissertation was on conflict photography, his work inspired me to write about the subject.
Anyone know what the shit is going on with the lights at the castle?
@_hammy https://t.co/OkcRtRp0Fj ate them when they had a stall, now they’ve got a restaurant. Remember them being good.
@felicitycloake He really has just cashed in his credibility and strolled off into the sunset. At least MPW’s stock cubes are half decent.
@lunchquest As a lover of both kimchee and pizza, that’s just a big pile of hell no for me.
A day of being left the fuck alone by the world awaits. Delightful.
In a shocking turn of events, I'm off to @sixDnorthEDN tonight, this time to wet a bairn's head. Other bars are available, apparently.
@msswiggy I give even fewer now that I took the old one apart and fixed it. NO MORE HOOVER SHOPPING.
It’s genuinely difficult to shop for something that you give so few fucks about.
Hoover shopping. Christmas is over.
@whatjoewrote We live in a world where food grows in lots of countries. You wanted mint in midwinter, Kenya stepped up.
